mapper.select: select f.FAQ_TITLE as noticeTitle ,f.FAQ_CONTENTS as noticeBody ,DATE_FORMAT(f.REG_DT, '%Y%m%d') as noticeDate from faq f order by f.REG_DT ;
mapper.insert: /** repository.SupportDao.insertQna */ INSERT INTO qna (PATIENT_ID, CENTER_ID, QUESTION_TYPE, QUESTION_TITLE, QUESTION_CONTENT, REG_DT, REG_ID) select a.PATIENT_ID ,a.CENTER_ID ,'01' ,#{questionTitle} ,#{questionBody} ,NOW() ,#{loginId} from patient p left outer join admission a on p.PATIENT_ID = a.PATIENT_ID where 1=1 and p.LOGIN_ID = #{loginId} limit 1
mapper.select: /** repository.SupportDao.selectQnaList */ SELECT QUESTION_TITLE as questionTitle ,DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y%m%d') as questionDate ,QUESTION_CONTENT as questionBody ,DATE_FORMAT(REPLY_DT, '%Y%m%d') as anawerDate ,REPLY_CONTENT as anawerBody FROM QNA WHERE 1=1 AND REG_ID = #{loginId};
